body_html: It should also be possible to build the C components from source so that they're linked to the correct libc rather than installing binaries from a foreign (glibc-based) system. This would be a less drastic solution.
body_text: It should also be possible to build the C components from source so that they're linked to the correct libc rather than installing binaries from a foreign (glibc-based) system. This would be a less drastic solution.
body: It should also be possible to build the C components from source so that they're linked to the correct libc rather than installing binaries from a foreign (glibc-based) system. This would be a less drastic solution.
